A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
What should have been a follow up to the FANTASTIC Force Awakens turns out to be a stand alone film that does its own thing\, very\, very\, very badly.

Who the hell was Snoke? How did he seduce Kylo to the dark side? How was he killed by Kylo so damn easily? Where did Maz Katana get Luke/Anakin's blue lightsaber from after it fell in Cloud City in Empire Strikes Back? Who were the Knights of Ren?

Lleast favourite part? So hard to choose because there were so many!
BB8 inside the walker\, Leia Poppins and Luke's humiliating death scene are all runners up. But I think it was actually the sIave kids at the end. It felt so out of place and random!
